attributes.action: give dad's more rights to care and look after there children like mum's have
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to get this petition underway to get the goverment to change there minds and make the same rights for dads  to have there children when a mariage splits up like what mums have all the time, there has been a increase in marriage split  up's ware the women has had the affair and can still be the main carrer of the child/children,
its about time the goverment stands up and admits the pressure on dads in this country is getting harder and needs to be fair across the board, not just one sided,and have easier access to see there children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
